reviews.review: Its good, and has some interesting lore!

De los mejores si no mejor juego de valve,una autentica joya que nunca aburre,gráficos increibles y muy bien optimizado (mi pc es de hace 15 años y lo corre perfectamente y muy estable),fisicas increibles y mecánicas innovadoras,aparte de que van renovando las mecánicas cada poco,asi que no te cansas de hacer siempre lo mismo,una historia asombrosa y estilo grafico genial,100% recomendado,mejor que muchos juegos de 60 dolares

Sou fã do portal desde que joguei o primeiro, as minhas horas aqui podem ser poucas mas nos consoles são grandes, comecei minha aventura no portal nos consoles e hoje jogo no computador, recomendo para cada amigue que goste de puzzle, aventura e procurar os segredos, também recomendo o coop que alem de uma segunda aventura com os novos robos, você pode fazer ''travessuras'' com seus amigues e a GLaDOS comenta sobre as ''travessuras'' que acontecem, no Pc diferente do console tem uma parte a mais então aproveite no PC o que no console não tem (são as fases que ficam a esquerda no momento que você desce do tubo e para no primeiro piso branco aonde é possivel colocar um portal).
I played this game on PS3 in 2016 and it was great not gonna lie.
Ein Stück Videospielgeschichte. Knifflige Rätsel und witzige Dialoge ohne Ende sorgen dafür, dass Portal 2 das vielleicht lustigste Puzzlespiel aller Zeiten ist.
친구랑 하기에 정말 재밌는 게임이고 혼자서도 하기에 재밌는 게임임 시간도 잘가고 복잡하지만 미로를 깨면서 나가는거라 뭔가 뿌듯함도 포함됨 강추!

this game is the masterpiece of the centrury!!! if you had the first game as a kid and want some nostalgia this is the game, or even just want something to play in the quarintine! I could not reccomend this enough so just BUY IT!!!!

this game is amazing!!
its ideas and puzzles are great

the only thing thats a little bit bad is that the single player campaign is kinda short

but still an amazing game and i hope one day valve will make portal 3!
One of the best games ever!
Hayatımda oynadığım şüphesiz en iyi 3 ün içindedir. Düşünmeden indirimdeyken alın.
Bu oyun gerek singleplayer gerekse co-op olarak oyun dünyasının mehdisidir bu oyun parasının hakkını her zerresine kadar hak eden bir başyapıddır
Десять сюрпризов из десяти, если вас бросили ваши биологические родители то не жалуйтесь. Рекомендую.

This game is really cool, before its release, no one had such an idea and such a gameplay, it's very cool that in addition to puzzles in the game there is a plot, and with it interesting, a variety of rooms and locations, all this makes portal 2 a very good game
весёлая и позитивная игра побольше бы таких !!!!!!!!!!!!
great story, good voice acting and fun co-op
игра интересна есть сюжет который риально интересен и ты можешь поиграть з другом и продвигать свой мозг)

The has good overall gameplay , physics are fun and the graphics are actually good ! The multiplayer is good too , but most of the times you would find clueless people and they would just leave or something ... Overall the game is pretty good so i recommend :)

3 часа проходил головоломку
прошёл очко кента, с которым играл
10 рваных жоп кореша из 10

I played this game on a T430 running Ubuntu 16.04. I loved the puzzles in this game, but I found some of them a little bit nauseating at times (due to all the jumping and being ejected from walls, roofs, etc).

Overall, solid story and gameplay. I would highly recommend this timeless game -- especially if you own a low-spec laptop.

Loco me compre el juego de hace tiempo y no lo jugué por que cuando iba a jugarlo con mi amigito de infancia y del alma luego me tomé una pastilla que me recetó el doctor pa una enfermedad que tengo creo y no se donde chucha se fue ese weon.
ara sıra gerçekten zekanı zorlaman gerekiyor tek oyunculu oynamadım ama arkadaşla harika bir oyun.

Leuk: Het samen kunnen spelen en de grappige soort humor die Glados heeft (karakter in de game die die spelers rondleidt)
Minder leuk: Als je met split-screen speelt moet één van de spelers met keyboard en muis. De ander moet met de controller. Eén van de levels is hierdoor niet te spelen vanwege de onnauwkeurigheid van de controller en de kleine vertraging die er is.
Игра просто лучшая и не требовательноя для компа. Покупай щас скидки
Сука как же заебал пидорас друг постоянно мою голову ворует
the best fps game i've ever played
很難 但是解謎很爽 劇情也超棒的
literlamente o melhor jogo lançado nas ultimas 2 decadas nao tem outro que chegue perto
очень классная  и офигенная игра класно вще, я русскей не учел
Неплохая не напряжная головоломка. Сумел пройти даже со сломаной рукой (кистью руки) поэтому всем советую купить!
I feel like a million years could go by and this would still be an absolute gem
Игра затягивает, геймплей очень интересный, игра ваще топ
why play portal 2? because you have to
ilk bölümler kolay ama ileri gittikçe beyniniz iyice yanıyo ama eğlenceli oyun
One of the best games to play Solo and Duo
One of the most solid games I've ever played. Could easily be considered as one of the greatest games of all time. If you have not played this yet, it is a MUST play.

僕はこのゲームをクリスマスであるこの日クリアしました。今世界中の一般的な男性がが大切なガールフレンドと手繋いでいますが僕の手にはポータルガンがありますした、ですが一切後ろ向きな気持ちはありません。本当ですよ？
あくまでクリアまでの体感ですが前作よりもボリュームは多めで広い空間を探索するようなマップもあります(一本道ですが)。ポータルがんを使ったギミックは前作に引き続きそれを活かす多くのギミックが追加されています。演出やストーリーもすごくなっていてついつい笑ってしまう皮肉や小ネタが散りばめられています。
難点はやはり酔いやすいことでしょうか、オートセーブがありある程度は保存されるので疲れてきたら別の用事をすることをお勧めします。
またマップが非常に暗く、見にくい部分もあります。あまりに暗い場所は進行に必要ないことが多いので比較的明るめな場所を探索することが好まれます。前作をやっていなくても楽しめますがストーリーは続いてるしセール時には120円くらいで売っているのでぜひ1作目から！！
sarıyo ilk günden 3 saat oynadım ama tek oyunculu zor biraz ilerleyince

This is my all time favorite game, The game-play and puzzles are very fun and not to difficult. The art style for all the characters are very cool. I love all the new game mechanics they added to the game. The game is also very cheap too, on steam sales it can drop to around $3. The voice actors did an amazing job and over all it was amazing! If you are thinking of buying this game I highly recommend it. 10/10 Best game I have ever played.
The best puzzle game out there, probably. Great humor too.

Why do TV shows even exist at this point, when games like this one surpass anything that networks can churn out? Some of the most hilariously scripted abuse you'll ever receive, alongside nervewracking and fun tests. Should be renamed 'Narcissistic Ex-Girlfriend Simulator 2' - brilliant.
if you are smart like me, you can play this game. 7/10 braincells
The cake will always lie to you.
I've played through the story of this game about 30 times and it has never gotten stale. BUY IT
this game was absolutely amazing, i played it 4 times. very good story line and game in general. 11/10
